alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:41AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water Levels Into Friday... Around 1 inch of rain fell from Wednesday evening through early Wednesday afternoon in the southeast Brooks Range. Runoff from this rainfall and melting of the remaining snowpack will cause rivers draining the southeast Brooks Range to rise to bankfull levels in some locations through Friday. This includes the Chandalar, Sheenjek, Coleen, and Christian Rivers and their tributaries. Water will cover gravel bars, increased debris will be coming downriver, and erosion is likely along some riverbanks. Those living or recreating along rivers draining the southeast Brooks Range should be prepared for rapid river rises and high water through this week.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Brooks Range; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
